original_text: Oh that I might have my request; and that God would grant me the thing that I long for!
korean_text: 나의 간구를 누가 들어 줄 것이며 나의 소원을 하나님이 허락하시랴

sentences.original_text: Oh that I might have my request
sentences.korean_translation: 아, 내가 나의 요청을 얻을 수 있다면

sentences.original_text: and that God would grant me
the thing that I long for
